subject: Dear
body:
Dear  
Thanks for your email and be informed that your information has been
forwarded to my attorney who will prepare all the relevant legal
documents of this transaction with your full name as the bonafid
beneficiary of the said funds.
I will get back to you once the document has been secured.
Thanks and remain blessed.
Ms  Dillon

subject: Re:   Dear
body:
Dear Ms. Dillon,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your assistance in preparing the legal documents for the funds. Could you please provide me with more details about the nature of these funds? How did they come about and what is their intended purpose?

I also wanted to inquire about any potential fees or costs associated with securing these documents. Are there any expenses that I need to be aware of? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of the financial aspects involved.

Once again, thank you for your help and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Dear Friend,

Thanks for your mail and be informed that I will be responsible for bearing
the cost of legalization,documentation needed to actualize this fund
transfer. Secondly,I am assuring you 100% Risk free transaction.You are to
 get back to me with the following information urgently to enable the
attorney to start documentation with your name as the bonafide beneficiary
of the amount in question and Also to process this fund ready for
remittance.

Your Full Name:

Your Full Address:

Your Telephone Number:

Thanks and God bless you while I await your speedy response.

Ms  Dillon
Email : msdillon1978@gmail.com

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Dear Ms. Dillon,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to bear the cost of the fund transfer. However, before we proceed, I would like to know more details about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What is the nature of this fund transfer? Is it a business transaction or a personal matter?
2. How did you come across my contact information and why did you choose me for this opportunity?
3. Can you explain the process involved in transferring the funds? Are there any legal requirements or paperwork that need to be completed?
4. Are there any risks involved in this transaction? I want to ensure that everything is legitimate and secure.
5. Can you provide me with some background information about yourself and your organization?

I look forward to hearing from you soon so that we can discuss further.

Best wishes,
Jeanne
